targets.expr: sum(system_memory_usage_bytes{cloud_region="$cloud_region", host_name="$host_name", state="used"}) + sum(system_memory_usage_bytes{cloud_region="$cloud_region", host_name="$host_name", state="free"}) + sum(system_memory_usage_bytes{cloud_region="$cloud_region", host_name="$host_name", state="cached"})
